info.name: YMA Backend API
info.description: Postman Collection for the YMA Backend API, generated automatically.

request.description: User registration with name, email, password, and optional photo.
User login with email and password.
Logs out the current user. Requires authentication.
Refreshes access token using a refresh token.
Initiates password reset process by sending a reset link to the user's email.
Renders the password reset form.
Submits new password for reset.
Get authenticated user's profile.
Update authenticated user's profile and optionally change password.

request.description: Create a new booking.
Get all bookings for the authenticated user (or all if admin).
Get bookings within a specific date range.
Get bookings for a specific product.
Check product availability for a date range.
Get a single booking by ID.
Update a booking by ID.
Delete a booking by ID.
Update shipping address for a booking.
Update billing address for a booking.
Create a new inventory item. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Get all inventory items. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Get available inventory for a specific product and date range. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Get booked inventory for a specific product and date range. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Check inventory availability for a specific product on a given date. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Trigger release of expired cart items. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Get a single inventory item by ID. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Update an inventory item by ID. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Delete an inventory item by ID. (Admin/Superadmin only)
Get system statistics. (Superadmin/Admin only)
Get all users with optional filtering and pagination. (Superadmin/Admin only)
Create a new user. (Superadmin/Admin only)
Get a user by ID. (Superadmin/Admin only)
Update a user by ID. (Superadmin/Admin only)
Deactivate a user by ID. (Superadmin/Admin only)
Change a user's role. (Superadmin only)

request.description: Send a plain email.
Create a new category. (Admin/Superadmin/Editor only)
Get all categories.
Get a single category by ID.
Update a category by ID. (Admin/Superadmin/Editor only)
Delete a category by ID. (Admin/Superadmin/Editor only)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Giant Bouncy Castle",
    "description": "A fun bouncy castle for all ages!",
    "summary": "Giant fun!",
    "price": 150,
    "perDayPrice": 100,
    "perWeekPrice": 500,
    "deliveryAndCollection": true,
    "priceDiscount": 10,
    "duration": "full-day",
    "maxGroupSize": 10,
    "difficulty": "easy",
    "categories": ["65c3b9c7b9c7b9c7b9c7b9c7"],
    "images": ["http://example.com/image1.jpg", "http://example.com/image2.jpg"],
    "imageCover": "http://example.com/cover.jpg",
    "location": {
        "state": "London",
        "city": "Central London"
    },
    "dimensions": {
        "length": 10,
        "width": 8,
        "height": 6
    },
    "availableFrom": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "availableUntil": "2026-12-31T23:59:59Z",
    "size": "large",
    "active": true,
    "stock": 5,
    "isSensitive": false,
    "material": "PVC",
    "design": "Castle Theme",
    "ageRange": {
        "min": 3,
        "max": 12,
        "unit": "years"
    },
    "safetyFeatures": ["Soft walls", "Safety netting"],
    "qualityAssurance": {
        "isCertified": true,
        "certification": "EN-14960",
        "warrantyPeriod": "1 year",
        "warrantyDetails": "Covers manufacturing defects."
    }
}

request.description: Create a new product. (Superadmin/Admin/Editor only)
Get all products with optional filtering and pagination.
Get a list of available product states.
Get products by a specific state.
Get featured products.
Search products by query.
Get products by category.
Get a single product by ID.
Update a product by ID. (Superadmin/Admin/Editor only)
Delete a product by ID. (Superadmin/Admin/Editor only)
Update product stock by ID. (Superadmin/Admin/Editor only)
Get the authenticated user's cart.
Add item(s) to the authenticated user's cart. Can add a single item or an array of items.
Update single or multiple items in the authenticated user's cart.
Remove a specific item from the authenticated user's cart.
Clear the entire cart for the authenticated user.
Create a new order from the user's cart.
Get all orders for the authenticated user.
Get a specific order by ID for the authenticated user.
